column4: I've installed fluxbox and xdm, removing gdm, and for some reason now the totem plugin under firefox does not play movies.  I'm assuming something with Gnome, but what?  Any ideas?
why did you bother removing gdm? that may of removed some other gnome related bits.
if you say so. then   following your logic gdm couldent of affected anything.. guess ya could prove it by reinstalling gdm and see.
